question: Which is the phosphorylated residue in the promoter paused form of RNA polymerase II?
ideal_answer: The promoter paused form of RNA polymerase II is phosphorylated on serine 5 residues of the C-terminal heptapeptide repeat domain (CTD) of the largest subunit.
